column2: Video game makers extend months-long rally with new titles on tap SAN FRANCISCO
column3: Sept 29 Shares of video game maker Activision Blizzard and rival Electronic Arts  extended months-long Wall Street rallies in September as investors eyed new versions of high-profile franchises such as "FIFA" and "Call of Duty

AA,BRIEF-Alcoa board approves separation of companyBRIEF-Alcoa declared quarterly dividend of 9 cents/shareAlcoa board approves split, expected effective Nov. 1 Sept 29 Aluminum producer Alcoa Inc said on Thursday its split into two publicly traded companies is expected to be effective Nov. 1, after the company's board approved the separation.  Alcoa board approves split, expected effective Nov. 1 Sept 29 Aluminum producer Alcoa Inc said on Thursday its split into two publicly traded companies is expected to be effective Nov. 1, after the company's board approved the separation. * Declared dividends on its $3.75 cumulative preferred stock and on its common stock.Alcoa board approves split, expected effective Nov. 1 Sept 29 Aluminum producer Alcoa Inc said on Thursday its split into two publicly traded companies is expected to be effective Nov. 1, after the company's board approved the separation. AMGN,Amgen and Arrowhead to develop gene-therapies for heart diseaseUPDATE 1-Amgen, Arrowhead team up on gene-therapies for heart disease Sept 29 Amgen Inc said on Thursday it would buy a stake in Arrowhead Pharmaceuticals Inc and collaborate with the company to develop gene-silencing therapies for heart disease.  UPDATE 1-Amgen, Arrowhead team up on gene-therapies for heart disease Sept 29 Amgen Inc said on Thursday it would buy a stake in Arrowhead Pharmaceuticals Inc and collaborate with the company to develop gene-silencing therapies for heart disease. Sept 29 Amgen Inc said on Thursday it would buy a stake in Arrowhead Pharmaceuticals Inc and team up with the company to develop gene-silencing therapies for heart disease.UPDATE 1-Amgen, Arrowhead team up on gene-therapies for heart disease Sept 29 Amgen Inc said on Thursday it would buy a stake in Arrowhead Pharmaceuticals Inc and collaborate with the company to develop gene-silencing therapies for heart disease.  
BAC,UPDATE 6-U.S. House panel lambastes Wells Fargo boss over phantom accounts WASHINGTON/NEW YORK, Sept 29 U.S. lawmakers called on Thursday for Wells Fargo & Co chief John Stumpf to resign and a top House Democrat demanded the bank be broken up because it is too big to manage. 
BBT,BB&T; to pay $83 mln to settle mortgage lending charges -Justice Department WASHINGTON, Sept 29 Branch Banking & Trust Company, a unit of BB&T; Corp, will pay $83 million to settle charges that it originated and underwrote federally insured mortgages that did not meet federal requirements, the U.S. Justice Department said on Thursday.

BA,BRIEF-Boeing said near widebody jet sale to Qatar Air after F-15 deal - BloombergBoeing nears wide-body jet sale to Qatar Airways - BbgUPDATE 2-Boeing nears wide-body jet sale to Qatar Airways -sources Sept 29 Boeing Co is close to clinching a large sale of widebody jetliners to Qatar Airways, a deal that moved closer with the recent U.S. approval of Boeing fighter jet sales to the Gulf nation, according to two people familiar with the situation.  UPDATE 2-Boeing nears wide-body jet sale to Qatar Airways -sources Sept 29 Boeing Co is close to clinching a large sale of widebody jetliners to Qatar Airways, a deal that moved closer with the recent U.S. approval of Boeing fighter jet sales to the Gulf nation, according to two people familiar with the situation. Sept 29 Qatar Airways is in late-stage talks to buy at least 30 Boeing Co wide-body jets, valued at more than $6.7 billion at list prices, Bloomberg reported, citing people familiar with the matter.UPDATE 2-Boeing nears wide-body jet sale to Qatar Airways -sources Sept 29 Boeing Co is close to clinching a large sale of widebody jetliners to Qatar Airways, a deal that moved closer with the recent U.S. approval of Boeing fighter jet sales to the Gulf nation, according to two people familiar with the situation. CBS,Sumner Redstone's National Amusements calls on CBS, Viacom to mergeBRIEF-National Amusements Inc proposes combination of CBS and ViacomBRIEF-Viacom announces receipt of letter from national amusementsBRIEF-Viacom files for two-part U.S. dollar offering of senior notes - SEC filingCBS, Viacom reunion could lift both after media upheavalUPDATE 3-Sumner Redstone urges Viacom-CBS deal, rules out others Sept 29 Sumner Redstone's National Amusements, the majority shareholder of CBS Corp and Viacom Inc , on Thursday proposed a merger of the two and said it would not support the acquisition of either media company by a third party or surrender its control of either firm.  UPDATE 3-Sumner Redstone urges Viacom-CBS deal, rules out others Sept 29 Sumner Redstone's National Amusements, the majority shareholder of CBS Corp and Viacom Inc , on Thursday proposed a merger of the two and said it would not support the acquisition of either media company by a third party or surrender its control of either firm. LOS ANGELES/NEW YORK Eleven years ago, media mogul Sumner Redstone declared the age of the conglomerate is over" as he prepared to split old-school broadcaster CBS from the fast-growing Viacom Inc  cable networks and the Paramount film studio.UPDATE 3-Sumner Redstone urges Viacom-CBS deal
